.. _`iRODS copy`:

IRODS COPY
==========

This wrapper performs iRODS copy from a file url





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_iRODS_iget:
        output:
            "my_file.txt"
        params:
            input = "/irods/path/archive/my_file.txt"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/iRODS/iget"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* remote_extra (dict): Extra parameters for remote
* input (string): A file to get from iRODS




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
